alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms in portions of Oakland, Livingston and southern Genesee Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 513 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Byron to West Bloomfield to near South Lyon. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pontiac and West Bloomfield around 520 AM EDT. Southfield, Novi, Royal Oak, Birmingham and Northville around 525 AM EDT. Warren, Troy, Rochester and Lake Fenton around 530 AM EDT. Grand Blanc, Holly and Sterling Heights around 535 AM EDT. Goodrich around 540 AM EDT. Ortonville, Detroit Zoo and Clarkston around 545 AM EDT. Oxford around 555 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Orchard Lake, Rankin, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Rose Center, Lathrup Village and Pinckney State Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
